long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Web Palimpsest is a brand new take on your browsing history. On every new page you visit, the Palimpsest will pull a random piece of text or image. Your new tab page is transformed into a constantly updating collage of your browser history, presented either as an abstract layered collage or as a grid. Develop your Palimpsest by exploring the web, and create a unique stamp of how you engage with the internet! Stylize your Palimpsest in the settings page and use the live links as portals back to your history!
